content: **description ** don t be caught like cinderella without a special slipper stitch these dainty slippers and hat for adorable accent pieces **materials ** 2 5 plastic foam ball cut in half for hat 3 long by 2 25 tall plastic slipper fabric stiffener ribbon and other embellishments free-crochet 1 1 https //www free-crochet com/crochet_accessories/crochet_gift_patterns/dainty_hats_and_slippers/
